nodes.text: The harvap was a non-sentient creature native to the planet Nim Drovis, though it spread throughout Hutt Space after the species was discovered and named by Jarn Harvus. Harvaps were originally carrion-eaters, though they later adapted by incorporating industrial waste and garbage into its diet as they became populous on heavily-industrialized worlds. They were especially numerous in Hutt Space, and the atmosphere of the planet Quesh led to the evolution of a group of harvaps that were able to survive the poisonous atmosphere.
